backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing products in a Map with CRUD methods and auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing state with nextId and an empty product map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing frontend files and components tied to product API migration and UI wiring.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior of all major frontend components, hooks, and types.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling roles, product/order hooks, toast notifications, and layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for adding, editing, deleting products with validation and async operations.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Instructional card showing simple steps for adding products in the admin area.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form that validates input, checks admin credentials, and triggers onLogin with a derived role.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Admin panel that groups orders by customer, displays them, and allows clearing all order history with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Shop interface that sorts products by sales, filters them via search, and triggers ordering while handling loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context providing Internet Identity login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: LocalStorage-backed hook to store, add, and clear customer orders with timestamp metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hook that fetches, adds, updates, and deletes products through the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/productMapping.ts: Provides helpers to convert product data between backend bigint format and UI string format, plus price formatting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Defines the Order interface with product name, creation time, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product interface with string id, name, price, and optional image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, and plugins using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, noting backend storage is unimplemented and listing related feature requirements.
